greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations p of [n] without fixed points such that p^n = Id.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..450
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n < 0, 0, If[n == 0, 1, Sum[Product[n - i, {i, 1, j - 1}] A[n - j, k], {j, Divisors[k] ~Complement~ {1}}]]];
Table[a[n], {n, 0, 25}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 23 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 18 2015
